history.content: Most big companies have completed their search for interns. However there are companies that may respond up until May.

children.subject:
I just wanted to say it’s definitely not too late now!! I applied for internships from January - February and it was mostly startups / lesser known companies but people were still recruiting. Very few companies actually explicitly reject you, and I’d expect to only hear back if they’re interested. I only applied for internships once (I ended up teaching / doing research my other summers) but I probably submitted ~80 applications, though many of them took only a couple minutes. How many is reasonable probably depends on how good of a candidate you are and how many options you’d like — I heard something or another (coding challenge / phone call / interview) from only around 10% of the companies I send applications to. That being said I was not the greatest candidate at the time :) 

I could be an atypical case, but for the most part, companies that were interested in me didn’t take all that long to get back to me — both in my job and my internship searches, I got responses within a couple weeks of applying from the places I ended up interviewing at. 

I’d say LinkedIn / cover letter not important (esp. cover letter), Github only important if you actually have something there — personal projects or open source contributions that a recruiter could take a look at. A link to a personal website where you have more details about projects you’ve done (including for class) can be a good idea.

history.content:
Hi, 

I'm a CS-intended sophomore and I had a few questions about internships. If I applied for internships in October, when should I be hearing back from them? What is the average response time? Or do companies only reach out if they are interested? 

I was also wondering how many summer internships I should apply for to have good chance of getting one? Is it too late now? Also, is it important to have a LinkedIn profile/cover letter/github when filling out the applications?

Thank you!
history.subject: Internships - Applying, Hearing Back
